definition: a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: But the U. S. still tops the charts when it comes to receiving foreign direct investment.
sentences.chinese: 美國仍然是排在吸引外國投資排名表的第一名。

definition: ranking/ordered list/top 20/roll of honor/to come nth out of 100
position in a ranking of names/place/rank
to rank (number 1, or third last etc)/to be among (those who are in a particular group)
notice or announcement/list of names/public roll of successful examinees
to appear on the public roll of successful examinees (i.e. pass an exam)/to make the list/(of a song) to hit the charts
